Text:
Instructions for using "user.cfg" to customize Orcs Must Die!

    Navigate to D:\Games\Steam\steamapps\common\orcs must die!\data\startup\ and create a text file called user.cfg
    Edit user.cfg and add options from the list below to change your settings:
        window
            This will force the game to run in Windowed Mode.  Currently we donâ€™t have a way to move the window around/reposition it.  We did this mainly as an option for people that want to run windowed mode but full screen.
        KeyboardLayout="AZERTY"
        KeyboardLayout=â€QWERTYâ€
        KeyboardLayout=â€QWERTZâ€
            Use one of these to override the locale selection that the game is using to pick your keyboard layout.  Setting this will force the game to use the layout that you specify in user.cfg
Corrupts the game after patching , Error message is as followed " Failed to correctly validate data files. Please validate game data files. " Don't download broken update
To be fair, I've never had problems with Alex's torrents (even tho they are for iPhone games). I'm still waiting for the game itself to download and give it a go.
I dont have a problem. Only to say the game is AWESOME and so adictive..!!! Try it for yourself...

Sorry about that guys. Script error.

Here's the fixed version.
Just re-apply using this new patch and your game will be working again. No need to re-install he game.
